title: Birdhouse Model, "Carlyle Hotel", 2002
inscribed: Presentation paper on bottom: "The Carlyle Hotel/ Painted by Richard Haas /Presented to Bobby Short /2002"
provenance: 2002: gift to Bobby Short from Carlyle Hotel; 2012: Eugene V. and Clare Thaw purchased from the Bobby Short sale, Sotheby's, New York; 2013: acquired by Museum.
dimensions:
H x W x D: 48.9 x 16.5 x 26.7 cm (19 1/4 x 6 1/2 x 10 1/2 in.)
H x W x D (with bird nest): 48.9 x 16.5 x 33 cm (19 1/4 in. x 6 1/2 in. x 13 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Modeled and painted in beige and pinkish beige replicating the tower of the Carlyle Hotel in New York, with a hole in center and wood peg below for the birds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Birdhouse Model, "Carlyle Hotel", 2002.
2002. Wood, paint. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2013-3-7.
